definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: One of my friends liked to collect postcards.
sentences.chinese: 我的一个朋友喜欢收藏明信片。

sentences.english: The postcard is from Hilde's father and wishes Hilde happy birthday.
sentences.chinese: 明信片是由希尔德的父亲，并希望希尔德生日快乐。

sentences.english: Send me a postcard when you get to New York.
sentences.chinese: 抵达纽约时寄张明信片给我。

sentences.english: The researchers measured how many responses they received by each type of postcard.
sentences.chinese: 研究者们分析了人们对于不同明信片的回复数量。

sentences.english: My dad was very much pleased with my greeting card.
sentences.chinese: 现在的很多迷你书印得像明信片一样漂亮。

sentences.english: This postcard is sent from Wittenberg in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 这是从德国威登堡寄来的明信片。

sentences.english: I see from the postmark that this card was posted from her holiday address.
sentences.chinese: 我从邮戳上看出这张明信片是从她度假的地方寄来的。
连张便宜明信片都没有。

sentences.english: You can buy a set of commemorative postcards published by the post office.
sentences.chinese: 你可以买一套邮局发行的纪念明信片。

sentences.english: Instead, these natural treasures are available on the many postcards.
sentences.chinese: 然而，这些自然奇珍却可在许多明信片上。

sentences.english: I got your postcard from the school.
sentences.chinese: 你从学校寄来的明信片我已收到。

sentences.english: How to do, will soon be entry, postcards stamps have been posted well.
sentences.chinese: 怎么办，马上就要入境，明信片的邮票已经贴好。

sentences.english: Postcards in a shop on the base.
sentences.chinese: 在基地商店里有明信片出售。

sentences.english: Here is a postcard for you . It says:Happy New Year to you .
sentences.chinese: “这里有张明信片，面着”祝新年快乐。

sentences.english: The postcard is from Jo to Lily .
sentences.chinese: 这张明信片是娇写给莉莉的。
